summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 26, 2019. It documents routine prison operations, staff assignments, and inmate statuses, notably recording that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch with an inmate companion. The report also notes media presence outside the institution related to Epstein.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Inmate #76318-054 recorded as being on suicide watch with an inmate companion. The report notes news media posted outside the institution in relation to a 'possible suicide attempt' involving him.

persons.name: Brown
persons.context: Inmate #70786-050 placed in the Special Housing Unit pending a Special Investigation Service (SIS) investigation.

persons.name: Hilario
persons.context: New admission to MCC New York with inmate number #87048-054.

persons.name: Hossain
persons.context: New admission to MCC New York with inmate number #87049-054, also admitted to the Special Housing Unit pending classification.

persons.context: Inmate #77179-054 released from MCC New York on this date.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: The MCC Daily Activity Report documents that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was on suicide watch with an inmate companion. The report also references news media posted outside the institution regarding a 'possible suicide attempt'.

events.title: MCC Daily Operations and Staffing
events.description: Routine prison operations for July 26, 2019, including inmate admissions/releases, housing unit assignments, staff leave, and overtime. The report notes staff shortages leading to unassigned correctional posts.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: On July 26, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was documented as being on suicide watch with an inmate companion at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The report explicitly links news media presence outside the prison to 'Epstein #76318-054 possible suicide attempt'.
The MCC was experiencing staff shortages, resulting in posts like '10-South #2' being unassigned during the Day and Evening watch shifts.
Inmate Brown (#70786-050) was placed in the Special Housing Unit pending a Special Investigation Service (SIS) investigation on the same day.
The document is a standard prison administrative log, providing a snapshot of institutional status less than two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
